title: Analyze Proteomics Data
description: A scientist needs to analyze mass spectrometry data to identify proteins that are differentially expressed between healthy and diseased tissue samples.

tasks.description: Process the raw mass spectrometry data to identify and quantify peptides.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully runs the data through a processing pipeline like MaxQuant.

tasks.description: Perform statistical analysis on the quantified protein data to find significant changes between sample groups.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs a t-test and identifies a list of proteins with statistically significant expression changes.

tasks.description: Perform a pathway analysis on the list of significant proteins.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses a tool like GSEA or DAVID to find that the changed proteins are predominantly involved in the 'inflammatory response' pathway.

tasks.description: Generate a volcano plot to visualize the results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a plot showing the statistical significance versus the magnitude of change for all proteins.
